body:
This is one of my all time favourite manga.  (•◡•) /
If you guys wanna understand what the heck they are saying (any one would!), I'm providing English translation service.
Just hit me up through handsometranslator@protonmail for more info!(>‿◠)✌
Istg I'll learn japanese and translate this masterpiece myself
God, this is so underrated. The art is just beautiful and I loves the designs so much, hyocorou never disappoints
